oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anderton's East Restaurant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Mrs. R. Roudebush -- 198 S. McClean -- Memphis, Tenn. -- Memphis – Restaurants -- Visitors to Memphis all agree Anderton’s East at 1901 Madison Avenue is mid-town Memphis’ most distinctive restaurant, featuring superb charcoaled steaks, delicious chicken, and succulent fresh seafood. -- (Another Smith Fixture Co. Installation) -- We cordially invite you to visit our beautiful new Anderton’s-East on Madison just east of McClean. We assure you the finest foods, served in an attractive, restful atmosphere convenient to your home. Bring the children – we have special menus for them. Park in our private area in rear of restaurant. Come in soon, won’t you? Hubert Anderton”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Anderton's East; restaurants; midtown; Madison Avenue;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Wilbur Curtis, 4328 Jamerson Road, Memphis, Tenn.
